import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register-student', templateUrl: './register-student.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register-student.component.css'] }) export class RegisterStudentComponent { constructor(private userService:UserService){} username:String = "" password:String = "" safeQuestion = "" safeResponse = "" name:String = "" lastName:String = "" gender:String = "" adr:String = "" phone:String = "" email:String = "" schoolType:String = "" grade:Number = 0 photo:File|null = null message:String = "" onFileSelected(event: any) { this.photo = event.target.files[0] as File; } registerUser(){ } }
